snippet: Mining, banking and chemical companies, and other businesses tied closely to prospects for growth, led the market lower.
abstract: Several weak economic reports send stock market plunging to its lowest level in a month.
lead_paragraph: Mining, banking and chemical companies, and other businesses tied closely to prospects for growth, led the market lower.

headline.seo: Market Plummets on Weak Economic Data
headline.main: Market Plummets on Weak Economic Data
headline.print_headline: Market Plummets on Weak Economic Data
